text: Ilana Rovina (January 30, 1934 - October 18, 2020) was an Israeli singer and actress. Rovina was one of Israel's first pop stars in the '50s and '60s and released a string of hits. She was also an actress and known for her role in I Like Mike (1961). Rovina was born in Jerusalem and died from COVID-19 in Tel Aviv, aged 86.Певица Илана Ровина умерла от коронавируса в возрасте 86 лет ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Israel Category:Israeli movie actors Category:Israeli singers Category:Jewish Israeli actors Category:Musicians from Jerusalem
title: Ilana Rovina
